name: nodejs-stack-app
description: A progressive nodejs express api for backend skills development and learning testing.

scripts.start: npm run seed && npm run build && node build
scripts.migrations: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run migrate:undo && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run migrate
scripts.migration: npm run migrate:undo && npm run migrate
scripts.seed: npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db-drop && npm run db-create && npm run test-migrate && npm run test-seed && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register ./src/Tests/*.test.js --timeout 500000 --exit || true
scripts.coverage: npm run test-seed && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register ./src/Tests/*.test.js --timeout 500000 --exit || true

author: Procech
